title: Raster image
summary: A raster image is an image file defined as a grid of pixels. They're also referred to as bitmaps. Common raster image formats on the Web are JPEG, PNG, GIF, and ICO.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
